Posts.Content: Aug 12, 2011 12:35AM - edited Aug 12, 2011 12:36AM by kathy1308 No I would not worry about it. I had the same problem. My period was suppressed by chemo and when I got it back it was heavy perhaps not lasting as long as it did for you but nevertheless it was not like usual. It will take time for your ovaries to go back to normal. You may get pain next time you get your peroid but be patient. i
